title: HEDGE FLOW Hedge funds boost AI tech bets to highest since 2016, Goldman Sachs says
description: Hedge funds' exposure to artificial intelligence-related tech hardware reached its highest in October since Goldman Sachs started tracking the data in 2016, the U.S. bank said in a client note.
content: Hedge fund buying in semiconductor and related chip industry stocks, considered to be sensitive to economic and business cycles, suggests speculators believe rising markets have further to go, Goldman said in the note on Thursday, seen by Reuters on ... [1115 chars]

title: With ‘Vibecoding,’ A.I. Can Help Anyone Build an App
description: Bringing on artificial intelligence as a collaborator can make coding feel more accessible to those with little training in it, but there are trade-offs.
content: What is a vibe? Many know it when they see it. A vibe is a certain energy, a sense of familiarity, “a placeholder for an abstract quality that you can’t pin down,” as Kyle Chayka wrote in The New Yorker in 2021. Nominally short for vibration, “vibes”... [383 chars]

title: Is artificial intelligence our economy’s friend or foe?
description: AI adoption is in the early stages, but it could be implemented in ways that boost the economy, economist Mark Zandi writes.
content:
As a professional economist, I have the opportunity to weigh in on many issues. In some of my views I’m highly confident, some less so. When it comes to artificial intelligence and its impact on the economy, I’m less confident.

title: AI models lacking African dialects curb uptake, mobile body says
description: A dearth of African-language content is delaying the uptake of artificial intelligence on the continent, compounding a lack of access to the technology, according to mobile industry body GSMA.
content:
